items.description: the id of the app

if this application is a game sold on Discord, this field will be the URL slug that links to the store page

the application's public flags

the welcome screen of a Community guild, shown to new members, returned in an Invite's guild object
guild NSFW level
Stage instances in the guild
custom guild stickers

items.name: ALL_MESSAGES
items.description: members will receive notifications for all messages by default

items.name: ONLY_MENTIONS
items.description: members will receive notifications only for messages that @mention them by default

items.name: DISABLED
items.description: media content will not be scanned

items.name: MEMBERS_WITHOUT_ROLES
items.description: media content sent by members without roles will be scanned

items.name: ALL_MEMBERS
items.description: media content sent by all members will be scanned

items.name: NONE
items.description: guild has no MFA/2FA requirement for moderation actions

items.name: ELEVATED
items.description: guild has a 2FA requirement for moderation actions

items.name: NONE
items.description: unrestricted

items.name: LOW
items.description: must have verified email on account

items.name: MEDIUM
items.description: must be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes

items.name: HIGH
items.description: must be a member of the server for longer than 10 minutes

items.name: VERY_HIGH
items.description: must have a verified phone number

items.name: NONE
items.description: guild has not unlocked any Server Boost perks

items.name: TIER_1
items.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 1 perks

items.name: TIER_2
items.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 2 perks

items.name: TIER_3
items.description: guild has unlocked Server Boost level 3 perks

items.name: ANIMATED_ICON
items.description: guild has access to set an animated guild icon

items.name: BANNER
items.description: guild has access to set a guild banner image

items.name: COMMERCE
items.description: guild has access to use commerce features (i.e. create store channels)

items.name: COMMUNITY
items.description: guild can enable welcome screen, Membership Screening, stage channels and discovery, and receives community updates

items.name: DISCOVERABLE
items.description: guild is able to be discovered in the directory

items.name: FEATURABLE
items.description: guild is able to be featured in the directory

items.name: INVITE_SPLASH
items.description: guild has access to set an invite splash background

items.name: MEMBER_VERIFICATION_GATE_ENABLED
items.description: guild has enabled Membership Screening

items.name: NEWS
items.description: guild has access to create news channels

items.name: PARTNERED
items.description: guild is partnered

items.name: PREVIEW_ENABLED
items.description: guild can be previewed before joining via Membership Screening or the directory

items.name: VANITY_URL
items.description: guild has access to set a vanity URL

items.name: VERIFIED
items.description: guild is verified

items.name: VIP_REGIONS
items.description: guild has access to set 384kbps bitrate in voice (previously VIP voice servers)

items.name: WELCOME_SCREEN_ENABLED
items.description: guild has enabled the welcome screen

items.name: TICKETED_EVENTS_ENABLED
items.description: guild has enabled ticketed events

items.name: MONETIZATION_ENABLED
items.description: guild has enabled monetization

items.name: MORE_STICKERS
items.description: guild has increased custom sticker slots

items.name: THREE_DAY_THREAD_ARCHIVE
items.description: guild has access to the three day archive time for threads

items.name: SEVEN_DAY_THREAD_ARCHIVE
items.description: guild has access to the seven day archive time for threads

items.name: PRIVATE_THREADS
items.description: guild has access to create private threads

flags.name: CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE
flags.description: Allows creation of instant invites

flags.name: KICK_MEMBERS *
flags.description: Allows kicking members

flags.name: BAN_MEMBERS *
flags.description: Allows banning members

flags.name: ADMINISTRATOR *
flags.description: Allows all permissions and bypasses channel permission overwrites

flags.name: MANAGE_CHANNELS *
flags.description: Allows management and editing of channels

flags.name: MANAGE_GUILD *
flags.description: Allows management and editing of the guild

flags.name: ADD_REACTIONS
flags.description: Allows for the addition of reactions to messages

flags.name: VIEW_AUDIT_LOG
flags.description: Allows for viewing of audit logs

flags.name: PRIORITY_SPEAKER
flags.description: Allows for using priority speaker in a voice channel

flags.name: STREAM
flags.description: Allows the user to go live

flags.name: VIEW_CHANNEL
flags.description: Allows guild members to view a channel, which includes reading messages in text channels

flags.name: SEND_MESSAGES
flags.description: Allows for sending messages in a channel

flags.name: SEND_TTS_MESSAGES
flags.description: Allows for sending of /tts messages

flags.name: MANAGE_MESSAGES *
flags.description: Allows for deletion of other users messages

flags.name: EMBED_LINKS
flags.description: Links sent by users with this permission will be auto-embedded

flags.name: ATTACH_FILES
flags.description: Allows for uploading images and files

flags.name: READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY
flags.description: Allows for reading of message history

flags.name: MENTION_EVERYONE
flags.description: Allows for using the @everyone tag to notify all users in a channel, and the @here tag to notify all online users in a channel

flags.name: USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS
flags.description: Allows the usage of custom emojis from other servers

flags.name: VIEW_GUILD_INSIGHTS
flags.description: Allows for viewing guild insights

flags.name: CONNECT
flags.description: Allows for joining of a voice channel

flags.name: SPEAK
flags.description: Allows for speaking in a voice channel

flags.name: MUTE_MEMBERS
flags.description: Allows for muting members in a voice channel

flags.name: DEAFEN_MEMBERS
flags.description: Allows for deafening of members in a voice channel

flags.name: MOVE_MEMBERS
flags.description: Allows for moving of members between voice channels

flags.name: USE_VAD
flags.description: Allows for using voice-activity-detection in a voice channel

flags.name: CHANGE_NICKNAME
flags.description: Allows for modification of own nickname

flags.name: MANAGE_NICKNAMES
flags.description: Allows for modification of other users nicknames

flags.name: MANAGE_ROLES *
flags.description: Allows management and editing of roles

flags.name: MANAGE_WEBHOOKS *
flags.description: Allows management and editing of webhooks

flags.name: MANAGE_EMOJIS_AND_STICKERS *
flags.description: Allows management and editing of emojis and stickers

flags.name: USE_APPLICATION_COMMANDS
flags.description: Allows members to use application commands, including slash commands and context menu commands.

flags.name: REQUEST_TO_SPEAK
flags.description: Allows for requesting to speak in stage channels. (This permission is under active development and may be changed or removed.)

flags.name: MANAGE_THREADS *
flags.description: Allows for deleting and archiving threads, and viewing all private threads

flags.name: USE_PUBLIC_THREADS
flags.description: Allows for creating and participating in threads

flags.name: USE_PRIVATE_THREADS
flags.description: Allows for creating and participating in private threads

flags.name: USE_EXTERNAL_STICKERS
flags.description: Allows the usage of custom stickers from other servers

items.description: the params + values from the user
the custom_id of the component
the type of the component
the values the user selected
id the of user or message targetted by a user or message command

items.fieldType: Map of Snowflakes to user objects
items.description: the ids and User objects

items.fieldType: Map of Snowflakes to partial member objects
items.description: the ids and partial Member objects

items.fieldType: Map of Snowflakes to role objects
items.description: the ids and Role objects

items.fieldType: Map of Snowflakes to partial channel objects
items.description: the ids and partial Channel objects

items.fieldType: Map of Snowflakes to partial messages objects
items.description: the ids and partial Message objects
the type of response
an optional response message

items.name: PONG
items.description: ACK a Ping

items.name: CHANNEL_MESSAGE_WITH_SOURCE
items.description: respond to an interaction with a message

items.name: DEFERRED_CHANNEL_MESSAGE_WITH_SOURCE
items.description: ACK an interaction and edit a response later, the user sees a loading state

items.name: DEFERRED_UPDATE_MESSAGE*
items.description: for components, ACK an interaction and edit the original message later; the user does not see a loading state

items.name: UPDATE_MESSAGE*
items.description: for components, edit the message the component was attached to

items.name: EPHEMERAL
items.description: only the user receiving the message can see it
